[ library(ic) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

?Vars #:: ++Domain

Constrain Vars to be integral and have the domain Domain.
Vars
Variable, list of variables or submatrix of variables
Domain
Domain specification

Description

Like ::/2, but constrains Vars to take only integer values from the given domain.

See Also

:: / 2, $:: / 2
